house_listing.house_description: Absolutely a 10+, 'house beautiful' with lots of tlc. One owner, ceramic tile, vaulted great rm, sunny eat-in w/bay window. Neutral colors, oversized fenced backyard. Home sparkles!!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Fenced, Foyer, Garage Door Opener, Pantry, Ranch Style
